name: slaxGIS
short_description:
---------------
The slaxGIS project has been replaced by vigerGIS project (http://sourceforge.net/projects/vigergis)
---------------

slaxGIS is a collection of GIS software packages meant to be added to the slax 6 live USB distribution.
- GRASS
- MapServer
- OpenLayers
- uDig
- OpenJUMP
- Zoo WPS
- PostgreSQL
- PostGIS

Besides these software packages, all the packages they need are included too (such as libraries, Proj, Gdal/OGR...)
summary: slaxGIS is a collection of GIS software packages
